content.content: I created a calendar for Ethereum/PM https://calendar.google.com/calendar/b/1?cid=ZXRoZXJldW0ub3JnX3NlbWZ0ZXZrNTh2dTUzcnYxNDltdmtsYTc4QGdyb3VwLmNhbGVuZGFyLmdvb2dsZS5jb20 It will track the meeting that is listed in:    GitHub    ethereum/pm Project Management: Meeting notes and agenda items - ethereum/pm      This includes the Stateless Ethereum Calls, and other EIP sync calls as they come up. If you would like to be added to the invite list for the recurring ACDs call let me know here or in DM and I will add you to the list. It is a public calendar and should be accessible by multiple clients. If there are any suggestions on better tools to use let us discuss! I am happy to migrate to what is best for the group. Cheers, James
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is advertising a calendar they created for Ethereum/PM meetings and is inviting people to join the invite list. They are open to suggestions for better tools to use. A 3rd party may ask questions about the calendar or give constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is advertising proposal
